text: Paul ga helekai, “Di babdais a John la anga hua gi digau ala ne huli gi daha mo nadau huaidu. Gei John gu helekai labelaa gi nia daangada o Israel bolo digaula e hai loo gi hagadonu Tangada dela ma ga hanimoi i ono muli, dela go Jesus.”19.4 Matthew 3.11; Mark 1.4,7-8; Luke 3.4,16; John 1.26-27
